text: This is the BBC. This podcast is supported by advertising outside the UK. This Leicester Dolokhounsachy for BBC Radio Nengale. This is Leicester Dolokgyunsich from BBC Radio Nongale. Now this Leicester Dolokgyzsche lear, this Leitre Mille, Da Heard, Oakhat, Ache, Gat. in MacGillain, this is the year 8 in 2.5. I've got a geese agon my goal Alastair Makhannich, and in the leoer, Wonder Tales from Scottish Myth and Legend. Ha the Heet chapitial me e'en the calichia beera or, as the scrive it heen, Beira Queen or, as it's scribe it heine, Beira Quinawinter. The other, there is topar on the crueachan in the Rageal. There's a chalach a taring ushge of you allah. At aum erie the grenia would a tuccall lechk, a-cantachach in the Tupor. Gachfisker, in a few fesker, in a few foeufoah, would be got cur haris on the topar in the tupor at ryeast. Kata Eichee, Vashaw, Y'a ch'nichy in lech a chur-erash, nahatja. Cholua a chai a griean foe, vruch, Ushke, and S'n Topper. And, Charo, Stater, Ruea, Lishavr and Lianne in Gleon, co-h-h-e-asol. Chruik's in Lachau. Harkin's skilach, carculloch, as chruachachg, Loughnish. Chruich, Fere, Bion, Nalapa. Leighany Clive, with clachin and creak. When it was a leam of a'er to a'erce, there'stou of the cliard of the tuchum in a mach. Shimugelan, a chrauch of, once in daoie-shan. Charroui auppert Leighen. There are Ochner-hervinton, Ech, and it's aque, and it's-eck, it's-ewee. It's o'-o'-mour, ma'er-a-weigh-heen. Charrot the Mick dole, it's the jirug the bian and the chileakal clachin in the heila. That's a carach given the Chalachan Mora in the Leighton the Geltach. Cruich a chaluch be in o'as on the Ross Iner there. There an oper d'erive, or it was a shereventon trang on the a-cha-e-e-ele, and, vah, and, cooper, lehain. Lavae, it's shie, and hugh-jee. Hachanick the clachan and creak in a mack at the chleavik. Huched you retov being o'ash, and, so on that, a-chruikie, Bein Uash-Fek. There arest sanricedia, in the Chalik. When I wu'u''ve found the talu with you huthraim, would the tally in o'ershin ch'erue Rishin'eran. When the wu'u gruechie, Gleon. There's s'an either hein and enifian thean, the bian, the Blyuwen in the Eldjian and the Gaur. When it was the tushka astruhug for the bianna incea'an, a dion of the chalach fair a bloon in Goer. Not ushka, very, but banja. Tours in the year, there was a chalach of Chavrechon, fashire Ilan Scarepa. That, I was on a shawl vore a glanag. Vigy Echilikul in shal a shalah a sthach don-vour for the Rowe in Kora a gul. Viggy Gassaltr a-and Gosan Gland. Inor, then, Vigie, the cur, shalah harish in Moulichin in bion, ason, a chirimachag. When it hughke it, the mullicin'all, the chaneked to
